content: Yes, I am familiar with Sir Humphrey Appleby. He is a fictional character in the British television series "Yes, Minister" and its sequel "Yes, Prime Minister." Sir Humphrey is a senior civil servant in the fictional Department of Administrative Affairs, and he is known for his political cunning, sophisticated language, and ability to manipulate the political process. He often clashes with the show's protagonist, the Minister Jim Hacker, as they both try to achieve their respective goals. The character is played by actor Nigel Hawthorne and is widely regarded as one of the greatest TV characters of all time.
